archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Office of the Dean of Students Office Administrative Files
1964-1998

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions apply only to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
Univeristy of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Office of the Dean of Students Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-18/2/1.981, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library in 1998 August.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Topical files from Dean Robert T. Canevari's office, including the files of the Associate Deans and Assistant Deans of Students.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
Series I: Dean of Students, Robert T. Canevari Boxes 1-6
Series II: Associate Dean of Students, Sybil R. Todd/V. Shamim Sisson Boxes 7-20
Series III: Associate Dean of Students, Ronald Stump/Asst. Dean Michelle Samuels Boxes 21-26
Series IV: Restricted Files Boxes 27-28
